title: StaticConfig
description: The `komorebi.json` static configuration file reference for `v0.1.40`

bar_configurations.description: Komorebi status bar configuration files for multiple instances on different monitors

border_colours.description: Window border colours for different container types (has no effect if a theme is defined)

border_z_order.description: DEPRECATED from v0.1.31: no longer required

cross_boundary_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when an action is called on a window at a monitor boundary

cross_monitor_move_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when a window is moved across a monitor boundary

float_override.description: Enable or disable float override, which makes it so every new window opens in floating mode

float_override_placement.description: Determines the `Placement` to be used when spawning a window with float override active

float_rule_placement.description:
Determines the `Placement` to be used when spawning a window that matches a
`floating_applications` rule

floating_applications.description: Identify applications which should be managed as floating windows

floating_layer_behaviour.description: Determines what happens on a new window when on the `FloatingLayer`

floating_layer_placement.description:
Determines the `Placement` to be used when spawning a window on the floating layer with the
`FloatingLayerBehaviour` set to `FloatingLayerBehaviour::Float`

floating_window_aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio to resize with when toggling floating mode for a window

focus_follows_mouse.description: END OF LIFE FEATURE: Use https://github.com/LGUG2Z/masir instead

global_work_area_offset.description: Global work area (space used for tiling) offset

invisible_borders.description: DEPRECATED from v0.1.22: no longer required

layered_applications.description: Identify applications that have the `WS_EX_LAYERED` extended window style

minimum_window_height.description: DISCOURAGED: Minimum height for a window to be eligible for tiling

minimum_window_width.description: DISCOURAGED: Minimum width for a window to be eligible for tiling

mouse_follows_focus.description: Enable or disable mouse follows focus

object_name_change_applications.description: Identify applications that send `EVENT_OBJECT_NAMECHANGE` on launch (very rare)

object_name_change_title_ignore_list.description: Do not process `EVENT_OBJECT_NAMECHANGE` events as Show events for identified applications matching these title regexes

remove_titlebar_applications.description: HEAVILY DISCOURAGED: Identify applications for which komorebi should forcibly remove title bars

slow_application_compensation_time.description: How long to wait when compensating for slow applications, in milliseconds

slow_application_identifiers.description: Identify applications which are slow to send initial event notifications

toggle_float_placement.description: Determines the placement of a new window when toggling to float

transparency_alpha.description: Alpha value for unfocused window transparency [[0-255]]

unmanaged_window_operation_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when commands are sent while an unmanaged window is in the foreground

window_container_behaviour.description: Determine what happens when a new window is opened

window_handling_behaviour.description: Which Windows API behaviour to use when manipulating windows

window_hiding_behaviour.description: Which Windows signal to use when hiding windows

duration.description: Set the animation duration in ms
